page.title: 13Landscape around Chislehurst
page.content: Chislehurst is quite a friendly place. It has a large area of woodland,but local history shows that the woodland stretched much further than it does now.Chislehurst is quite hilly.It is notsy ,but not too quiet. We can get most of what we need from the local supermarket in the High Street.If we need to we can get to londosily by rail. There is a mixture of housing:Edwardian,Victorian and Post War. There are not many modern houses. There are many Scout troops,Brownie packs and also lots of other clubs.
